feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
